name: Marvellous Ultimate Appliance
body:
The team page for Team Admiral Dolphin from GovHack 2013.

# Team Members
* [Frank Sainsbury](http://twitter.com/fsainsbu) – oracle of all things.
* [Tim Nugent](http://twitter.com/the_mcjones) – immortal.
* [Jon Manning](http://twitter.com/desplesda) – codes all the things.
* [Nic Wittison](http://twitter.com/nicwinton) – only eats bacon.
* [Matthew D'Orazio](http://twitter.com/ltgamer) – breaks all the things.
* [Rex Smeal](http://twitter.com/rexsmeal) – draws all the things.
* [Josh Deprez](http://twitter.com/mrjosh9000) – equates.
* [Eloise Macdonald-Meyer](http://twitter.com/ducky_tape) – farming usurer. 
* [Paris Buttfield-Addison](http://twitter.com/parisba) – not entirely sure.
* [Sebastian Cook](http://twitter.com/tsuite) – hrnng I dunno.

# Tools Used
* [Google Drive](http://drive.google.com) – collaborative planning, designing, sorting and review of interesting data sets.
* [Unity](http://www.unity3d.com) – 3D development environment.
* Photoshop
* JSON formatted data
* Spreadsheets

# Development Approach
* Paper prototyping
* Throwing science at the wall and seeing what sticks
* Fraud

# Data Sets
* [Appliance Energy Ratings](http://opendata.linkdigital.com.au/dataset/appliance-energy-ratings) – energy usage and efficiency rating of common household appliances such as air conditioners.
* [National Regional Profile](http://stat.abs.gov.au/Index.aspx?DataSetCode=NRP7#) - ABS data showing characteristics of regions and in comparing regions across Australia.
* [Average Price for Australian Electricity](http://www.aemo.com.au/Electricity/Data/Price-and-Demand/Average-Price-Tables) - AEMO data on average electricity prices in Australia.

# Miscellaneous
* [Photos of GovHack 2013 in Hobart taken by the team](http://lab.to/gh2013pics)
* [Team page of GovHack 2013 Hackerspace](http://hackerspace.govhack.org/?q=groups/marvellous-ultimate-appliances)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
